column3: News;Sihanoukville:------ Some survivors were rescued from the rubble by the rescue team
column4: who are continuing to search for more trapped under the collapsed hotel building of a Chinese company in Sihanoukville.------Mr. Mony Min
column8: the death toll has risen to 10
column9: and more than 20 injured people are in hospital.------ As the rescue operation continues
column10: it is not yet known how many more victims remain in the rubble
column12: despite the fact that hundreds people are busy removing bricks
column13: a task that could take at least two days to complete.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/453947
